explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the relationship between firms' digital transformation (FDT) and green technological innovation (GTI), analyzing their effects and mechanisms using fixed-effect and mediating effect models. The study does not mention any machine learning techniques, algorithms, or models, nor does it involve any of the listed keywords related to machine learning, deep learning, or large language models. The research is grounded in diffusion of innovation (DOI) theory and the technology-organization-environment (TOE) framework, which are unrelated to the provided keywords.
